# PED::GET_PED_DEFENSIVE_AREA_POSITION

## Summary
Returns the position of the ped's defensive area

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **BOOL** applyToSecondaryDefensiveArea = false: If true will get you the position of the secondary area

## Returns
* **VECTOR**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Will return a zero vector if the requested defensive area does not exist
